Pdf neuron of abdominal neuromere.Develops_from: larval Pdf neuron of abdominal neuromere
Pdf neuron of abdominal neuromere.Definition: Pdf positive neuron whose soma is located in the cortex of the fused adult abdominal ganglia. There are 4-6 of these, all of which project posteriorly, fasciculating with the abdominal nerve trunk.
